item.title: 英国支持日产表明斯塔默力图挽救工业岗位
item.description: 英国政府有望为日产汽车公司提供新的支持，这是英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）推动保护英国工业基础的最新迹象，他试图避免来自奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）领导的改革党的政治威胁，并保护日本汽车制造商著名的桑德兰工厂。【原文：The prospect of new support from the UK government for Nissan Motor Co. is the latest sign of Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s push to protect Britain’s industrial base as he tries to stave off a political threat from Nigel Farage’s Reform party and preserve the Japanese automaker’s famous Sunderland plant.】

item.title: 安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）支持的初创公司正试图打造更安全的 VPN
item.description: 3 月俄罗斯无人机袭击基辅的后果。【原文：The aftermath of a Russian drone strike in Kyiv in March.】

item.title: Anthropic 任命 Netflix 联合创始人里德-黑斯廷斯为董事会成员
item.description:
董事会寻求平衡人工智能的商业利益和对社会的责任

。【原文：

Board seeks to balance AI’s business interests, responsibilities to society

】

item.title: 德国认为，如果达不到目标，天然气储存干预的门槛很高
item.description: 德国认为，今年任何支持天然气储存工作的干预措施都有很高的门槛，即使德国最终未能实现新的具有法律约束力的目标。【原文：Germany sees a high bar for any intervention to support gas storage efforts this year, even if the country ends up missing its new legally-binding targets.】

item.title: 印度要求电子商务公司停止欺骗性购物行为
item.description: 印度政府要求电子商务平台和零售商删除所谓的 "黑暗模式 "或操纵客户进行非预期购买的欺骗行为。【原文：India’s government asked e-commerce platforms and retailers to remove so-called ‘dark patterns’ or deceptive actions that manipulate customers into making unintended purchases.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）称，卡尼的国防开支将为经济增加高达 460 亿美元的收入
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）的经济学家表示，加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）提高国防开支所带来的经济收益可能是计划投资成本的两倍多。【原文：The economic gains of Prime Minister Mark Carney’s defense spending boost will likely be worth more than double the planned investment costs, according to Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce economists.】

item.title: 打击支付诈骗后，英国银行卡诈骗仍在飙升
item.description: 在英国打击授权推送支付诈骗之后，诈骗分子改变了策略，这意味着去年被盗的总金额基本保持不变。【原文：Fraudsters have switched up their tactics after the UK cracked down on authorized push payment scams, meaning the overall amount stolen was broadly unchanged last year.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示，约 73% 的美国人财务状况至少尚可
item.description: 美联储的一项年度调查显示，去年年底，美国人的经济状况基本稳定，对经济的悲观看法也略有缓和。【原文：Americans were mostly financially stable and had a slightly less pessimistic view of the economy at the end of last year, according to an annual survey by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 印度在内幕交易案中封禁印度印度银行前首席执行官等人
item.description: 根据一项初步命令，印度证券市场监管机构已禁止亿万富翁 Hinduja 兄弟支持的印度印度银行有限公司（IndusInd Bank Ltd.）的一些前任和现任高管进入资本市场，此案涉嫌内幕交易。【原文：India’s securities market regulator has banned some former as well current top executives of IndusInd Bank Ltd., backed by the billionaire Hinduja brothers, from accessing the capital markets in a case of alleged insider trading, according to an initial order.】

item.title: 在荷兰政府做出改变后，ASML 敦促在税收问题上保持一致
item.description: ASML Holding NV 呼吁荷兰政府确保稳定的投资和财政政策，并批评了减少外国工人福利的税收政策决定。【原文：ASML Holding NV called on the Dutch government to ensure stable investment and fiscal policy, criticizing tax policy decisions that reduced benefits for foreign workers.】

item.title: 科勒资本在 10 亿美元证券化中捆绑私募股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，科勒资本公司（Coller Capital）正在组建一个约 10 亿美元的结构性融资工具，由其一些私人资本二级基金的股权支持，这是该公司今年的第二笔此类交易。【原文：Coller Capital is assembling a roughly $1 billion structured finance instrument backed by stakes in some of its private capital secondary funds, the firm’s second such deal this year, according to people with knowledge of the transaction.】

item.title: 莱维镇父母探讨人工智能对女儿和儿子的意义
item.description:
在《利维镇播客》的第七集里，一位母亲帮助她的女儿为反伪造法辩护，另一位母亲发现她的儿子在卧室里骚扰女性。【原文：

In the seventh episode of the Levittown podcast, a mother helps her daughter advocate for an anti-deepfake law — and another discovers her son is harassing women from his bedroom. 

】

item.title: 智利铜矿商开始谈判，向中国冶炼厂提供负加工费优惠
item.description: 据熟悉谈判情况的人士透露，在全球矿石供应紧张的情况下，智利铜矿商安托法加斯塔公司（Antofagasta Plc）建议对销售给中国冶炼厂的矿石收取负处理费。【原文：Chilean copper miner Antofagasta Plc has proposed negative treatment charges for sales to Chinese smelters amid a global squeeze on supplies of ore, according to people familiar with the negotiation.】

item.title: 私人信贷投注额达 460 亿美元 资金管理公司 Patria
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大的另类资产管理公司之一 Patria Investments Ltd. 正在加速进军私人信贷领域。【原文：Patria Investments Ltd., one of Latin America’s largest alternative asset managers, is accelerating its push into private credit.】

item.title: 欧洲天空比科维德之前更繁忙，燃料需求大增
item.description: 欧洲的天空比 Covid 大流行之前更加繁忙，这对该地区的燃料供应炼油厂来说是一大利好。【原文：Europe’s skies are busier than before the Covid pandemic, a boon for the region’s fuel-supplying oil refiners.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）称，净收入增加，美国银行票据损失缓解
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp）周三公布的一份报告显示，美国银行第一季度的票据损失有所缓解，净收入有所增加。【原文：US banks’ paper losses eased in the first quarter, while net income increased, according to a report published Wednesday by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.】

item.title: 特朗普发出威胁后，哈佛大学和麻省理工学院引领名校 40 亿美元债务狂潮
item.description: 自 3 月份以来，美国名牌大学已获得超过 40 亿美元的额外债务，这将有助于在特朗普政府对其预算发起攻击时保护其财务。【原文：Elite American universities have secured over $4 billion in additional debt since March that will help protect their finances as the Trump administration takes aim at their budgets.】

item.title: 民族主义候选人在激烈的波兰总统竞选中支持加密货币
item.description: 波兰民族主义候选人 Karol Nawrocki 承诺，如果他在周日竞争激烈的总统选举中获胜，将支持加密货币行业。【原文：Poland’s nationalist candidate Karol Nawrocki has pledged to support the cryptocurrency industry if he wins a tightly-contested presidential election on Sunday.】

item.title: 交易员等待英伟达发布财报，美国股市上涨
item.description: 美国股市周三上涨，原因是投资者为将于收盘后发布的英伟达公司财报做准备。【原文：US stocks rose on Wednesday as investors geared up for Nvidia Corp.’s earnings that will be released after the close.】

item.title: 据说华宝正与 KPS 商谈合作开发格雷斯海默公司事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，华平投资集团正在与 KPS Capital Partners 讨论联手收购德国药品和化妆品包装制造商 Gerresheimer AG 的事宜。【原文：Warburg Pincus is in discussions with KPS Capital Partners about teaming up on an offer for Gerresheimer AG, the German maker of packaging for drugs and cosmetics, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Telegram 首席执行官杜罗夫表示，Telegram 将在 3 亿美元的 xAI 交易中分销 Grok
item.description: Telegram 首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）表示，Telegram 与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 公司达成了一项为期一年的协议，向该消息平台的十多亿用户分发其 Grok 聊天机器人。【原文：Telegram agreed to a one-year deal with Elon Musk’s xAI to distribute its Grok chatbot to the messaging platform’s billion-plus users, according to Chief Executive Officer Pavel Durov.】

item.title: Instacart 提升业务主管罗杰斯为首席执行官，西莫离职转投 OpenAI
item.description: Instacart 提升首席业务官克里斯-罗杰斯（Chris Rogers）为首席执行官，接替本月早些时候表示将前往 OpenAI 担任高级领导职务的菲吉-西莫（Fidji Simo）。【原文：Instacart promoted Chief Business Officer Chris Rogers to chief executive officer, replacing Fidji Simo who said earlier this month that she’s leaving for a top leadership position at OpenAI.】

item.title: 中国 "荣耀 "百亿美元人工智能计划开发仿人机器人
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Honor Device Co., the smartphone maker spun out from Huawei Technologies Co., is developing humanoid robots as part of its push into China’s crowded artificial intelligence arena.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行俄罗斯分行可能吸引阿联酋企业竞标
item.description: 总部设在阿拉伯联合酋长国的公司已向意大利政府提出可能竞购意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）俄罗斯分行的计划。【原文：United Arab Emirates-based companies have reached out to Italy’s government with plans for a possible bid for Italian lender UniCredit SpA’s Russia unit.】

item.title: 法国要求银行修改规则以支持国防公司
item.description: 面对俄罗斯在乌克兰的侵略，法国发出了欧洲迄今为止最强烈的呼吁之一，要求金融业支持国防公司，以加强该地区的安全。【原文：France issued one of Europe’s starkest calls yet for the financial industry to support defense companies, as the region shores up its security in face of Russian aggression in Ukraine.】

item.title: YouTube正在吞噬电视，并向情景喜剧发起进攻
item.description:
创作者正在制作更长的节目，以满足观众的需求：越来越多的观众在电视机前观看节目。【原文：

Creators are making longer shows to meet viewers where they are: increasingly, in front of their TVs.

】

item.title: 加拿大电信公司 BCE 将建设大型人工智能数据中心网络
item.description: 加拿大收入最高的电信公司 BCE 公司将在全国建立人工智能数据中心网络，这与美国和国外积极建设人工智能基础设施的做法如出一辙。【原文：BCE Inc., Canada’s largest telecom company by revenue, will set up a network of artificial intelligence data centers across the country, mirroring the aggressive AI infrastructure build-out happening in the US and abroad.】

item.title: 尽管允许阿根廷比索浮动，米莱仍干预货币市场
item.description: 阿根廷政府在一个月前承诺实行货币自由浮动后，又对市场进行了干预，以影响比索的价值，此举与其对国际货币基金组织的承诺形成了鲜明对比。【原文：After pledging a free-floating currency a month ago, Argentina’s government has intervened in the market to influence the peso’s value, a move that stands in sharp contrast to its commitments to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 伦敦超越分裂城市的快时尚首次公开募股
item.description: 随着申银万国集团有限公司（Shein Group Ltd.）据说将把首次公开募股的目光转向香港，伦敦金融界的目光开始超越这家快速时尚集团，因为上市活动开始打破长达数年的干旱。【原文：With Shein Group Ltd. said to turn its attention to Hong Kong for its initial public offering, London’s financial community is looking beyond the fast-fashion group as listing activity begins to break a years-long drought.】

item.title: 俄罗斯燃料出口因柴油和燃料油增长而创下三个月新高
item.description: 俄罗斯 5 月份的精炼燃料出口量有望创下 3 个月来的新高，因为柴油和燃料油出口量的增加足以弥补石脑油和其他二级原料燃料出口量的放缓。【原文：Russia’s exports of refined fuels in May are on track to reach a 3-month high as increased diesel and fuel oil shipments more than compensated for a slowdown in naphtha and other secondary feedstock fuel flows.】
